title: Docker:: Exception: Unsupported dataset_type: "multi-animal-imgaug"
body:
System:
Ryzen 7 8 cores/16 threads
32 GB RAM

Ubuntu 18.04
Anaconda environment (DLCut)
DeepLabCut 2.2b7

GPU: RTX2060
NVIDIA-SMI 440.100
Driver Version: 440.100
CUDA Version: 10.2

Problem Training Network from inside Docker container:

1. FIRS ERROR MESSAGE occurred because I didn't have **tkinter** installed in the container. I installed it.
2. SECOND ERROR MESSAGE: I couldn't import **_deeplabcut_**! I could only import **_deeplabcutcore_** (even though, I had set _DLClight=True_). I supposed after running Dockerfile (during Docker setup) I would have _deeplabcut_ installed.

2. THIRD ERROR MESSAGE (below): after successfully importing **_deeplabcutcore_**

